tweet.text: Glenn’s 1962 flight & Khrushchev ltr prompted Kennedy to send Khrushchev 2 ltrs abt space coop #RIPJohnGlenn #FRUS https://t.co/5TuwNWzA4m https://t.co/vcznbNmMLR
